snippet.title: Yupitergrad: Sneaki Peaki 🪐
snippet.description:
▁ ▂ ▄ ▅ ▆ ▇ █💠𝘾𝙃𝙀𝘾𝙆 𝙐𝙎 𝙊𝙐𝙏💠█ ▇ ▆ ▅ ▄ ▂ ▁
💬【𝙳𝙸𝚂𝙲𝙾𝚁𝙳】https://discord.gg/ZUQfuxgjru
📰【𝙵𝙰𝙲𝙴𝙱𝙾𝙾𝙺】https://www.facebook.com/Gamedust
🦆【𝚃𝚆𝙸𝚃𝚃𝙴𝚁】https://twitter.com/GamedustTT
🕹️【𝚂𝚃𝙴𝙰𝙼】https://store.steampowered.com/dev/GameDust
📷【𝙸𝙽𝚂𝚃𝙰𝙶𝚁𝙰𝙼】https://www.instagram.com/gamedust_studio/
-----------------
GET THE GAME FOR FREE
【SideQuest】 https://sidequestvr.com/app/3533/yupitergrad-sneaki-peaki
【Itch.io】 https://gamedust-studio.itch.io/yupitergrad-sneaki-peaki
【Steam】 https://store.steampowered.com/app/1579120
Show your potential, candidate!

Become a real acrobat in a cosmonaut costume! Yupitergrad Sneaki Peaki gives you the chance to try an amazing game about repairing a space station near Jupiter - Yupitergtrad. In Sneaki Peaki you can test the controls, check its comfort, and try to get the best time on three specially selected boards in Time Attack mode.

Yupitergrad Sneaki Peaki features:

* Yupitergrad Tutorial;
* Three Time Attack levels from base game
* Leaderboards
* Extra voice overs from AI companion
* Great music
* Chance to sneak peak base game
* Unique dieselpunk-in-space vibe 

About Yupitergrad

Yupitergrad is a game with two various modes: Time Attack and campaign. The plot takes us to a space station near Jupiter, where a brave cosmonaut has to repair many broken devices. To move around, the hero uses special sucker launchers (grappling hooks-like-devices), thanks to which he can get to places inaccessible to ordinary people. Yupitergrad is a dynamic platformer with a lot of puzzles, traps and wacky humour, sunk in futuristic dieselpunk sauce. In Time Attack mode you can test your skills by competing with players from around the world to see who will achieve the best results on 20 specially built levels.
